original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(2246)@</color><color=#FFE787>技能射程：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_range(2246)@</color>在指定地點召喚生死獄，吞噬周圍的敵人，同時以<color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Int(2246)@</color><color=#13ccd7>智力</color>對敵人造成法術傷害。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(2246)@</color><color=#FFE787>Skill range: </color><color=#ccffcc> $Skill_range(2246)@</color> Summon the Hell of Life and Death at a designated location, swallow the surrounding enemies, and use <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Int(2246)@</color><color=#13ccd7>Int</color>Inflict spell damage on the enemy.
